sent.orig: I have an Apple iMac, and an Apple i Phone with around 122 apps.
sent.trans: 我有一台苹果公司(Apple)的iMac,还有一台iPhone,上面装了大约122个应用软件。

sent.orig: Apple's continued glory eats away at me like a maggot at my core.
sent.trans: 苹果(Apple)一直以来的荣耀，就像蛆虫一样啃噬着我的心。

sent.orig: Management Style: At Apple, Jobs is a mercurial micromanager -- some say nanomanager.
sent.trans: 管理风格：在APPLE公司，乔伯斯是一位机智善变的微软经理。

sent.orig: Normally, when you plug Macs together, they communicate by using a built-in scheme called Apple Talk.
sent.trans: 当你将Mac连在一起时，它们常常是通过所谓的内部协议Apple-Talk来进行通讯的。

sent.orig: Apple positioned it as the machine for the Internet, where compatibility questions are no big deal.
sent.trans: APPLE电脑定位于因特网，因为在因特网上兼容性并不是一个较大的难题。
